about_the_company: Salas OBrien is an employee-owned engineering and professional services firm focused on achieving impact for our clients, our team, and the world. They work across a variety of industries providing integrated engineering and consulting services, including design for data centers, healthcare, science and technology, high-rise buildings, clean energy, education, and other building types as well as structural and building sciences, infrastructure asset management, advanced robotics, and more.
job_responsibilities: Work with engineer mentors in the design team
Take ownership of portions of various projects
Work in coordination with other engineering disciplines
Learn how a complete design package is developed
Acquire time management, communication, and CAD drafting skills
required_soft_skills: Effectively manage work and academic responsibilities simultaneously
Desire for diversity in the engineering field
required_work_authorization: Verification of US Citizenship required upon hire
required_education: Currently enrolled in an Electrical Engineering program at a four-year ABET university or college with preferred targeted graduation date within 1 year (preferred). Will consider interns who are graduating within 2 years, depending on our needs.
